data.persona: I live for village parties. Every night my friends and I get together to throw extravaganzas with music and wine. We party until the sun comes up.
data.description:
You are in the palace ballroom.
A grand room with a marble floor. The ballroom can fit over 5,000 people. Its ceilings are high, vaulted, and adorned with many exquisite murals. Stained glass windows surround the entire room.
There's some stained glass windows, a marble floor, and a mural here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a flannel shirt, and wielding a voodoo doll.

data.long_motivation: I party every night with my friends.
